title: P2 looking for duo to try get diamond
body:
Ive climbed from gold 5 to plat 2 in roughly a week, where i have been stuck for a few days and am currently on a massive losing streak. I feel like a majority of players i come across just want to argue in chat rather than improve, so i am looking for a duo partner who is willing to improve with me and try get to diamond. 

Plat 5 + although if you are already diamond and would be kind enough to duo with me that would be greatly appreciated!
I have discord/skype/curse voice/teamspeak for communication
